mapper.update:
update P_MPED
CODE = #{code},
NAME = #{name},
MPED_INDEX = #{mpedIndex},
CP_ID = #{cpId},
MP_ID = #{mpId},
METER_ID = #{meterId},
MAIN_FLAG = #{mainFlag},
M_MPED_ID = #{mMpedId},
P_MPED_ID = #{pMpedId},
E_MPED_ID = #{eMpedId},
VOLT_CODE = #{voltCode},
CONS_ID = #{consId},
TG_ID = #{tgId},
LINE_ID = #{lineId},
SUBS_ID = #{subsId},
TRAN_ID = #{tranId},
CAP_ID = #{capId},
BUSINESS_PLACE_CODE = #{businessPlaceCode},
MPED_PROP = #{mpedProp},
MP_TYPE = #{mpType},
SIDE_CODE = #{sideCode},
SWITCH_ID = #{switchId},
SWITCH_NO = #{switchNo},
METER_BOX_ID = #{meterBoxId},
MEAS_MODE = #{measMode},
WIRING_MODE = #{wiringMode},
STATUS_CODE = #{statusCode},
VOLT_TYPE = #{voltType},
DATAINTERVAL = #{datainterval},
INCREMENT_FLAG = #{incrementFlag},
CALC_TPL_ID = #{calcTplId},
CALC_SCHEME = #{calcScheme},
CHK_TPL_ID = #{chkTplId},
Q_CALC_FLAG = #{qCalcFlag},
MP_CALC_MODE = #{mpCalcMode},
GUID = #{guid},
DATA_SRC = #{dataSrc},
DATA_ID = #{dataId},
AREA_CODE = #{areaCode},
WEIGHT = #{weight},
MP_CALC_TYPE = #{mpCalcType},
SETTLE_MPED_ID = #{settleMpedId},
METER_CLASS = #{meterClass},
CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
LAST_MODIFIER_ID = #{lastModifierId},
LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{lastModifyTime},
and ID = #{id}
